misc: Has planted his seeds in four different women in four different decades.
biography: Mikko is a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, known for his calculated approach and unwavering focus on the course. Representing Lakeside Golf Vammala, Mikko's presence is always anticipated by fellow competitors and fans alike.

With ten past appearances, Mikko's experience is undeniable, making him a formidable player to watch. While the Hector Trophée and Victor trophy have eluded him thus far, his determination remains as steadfast as ever. Hector Trophée 2025 will mark Mikko's eleventh appearance in the tournament, a testament to his enduring commitment to the sport.
Off the course, Mikko is known for his unconventional lifestyle. A true bon vivant, he is rumored to have planted his seeds in four different women across four different decades.
